resources.string:
Normalised effective dose per doseâ€“length product (DLP) for adults (standard physique) and paediatric patients of various ages for various body regions. (Bongartz, et al. 2004, Shrimpton et al. 2006). 
 
 0 year old: head and neck 0.013, head 0.011, neck 0.017, chest 0.039, abdomen and pelvis 0.049, trunk 0.044 
 
 1 year old: head and neck 0.0085, head 0.0067, neck 0.012, chest 0.026, abdomen and pelvis 0.030, trunk 0.028 
 
 5 year old: head and neck 0.0057, head 0.0040, neck 0.011, chest 0.018, abdomen and pelvis 0.020, trunk 0.019 
 
 10 year old: head and neck 0.0042, head 0.0032, neck 0.0079, chest 0.013, abdomen and pelvis 0.015, trunk 0.014 
 
 Adult: head and neck 0.0031, head 0.0021, neck 0.0059, chest 0.014, abdomen and pelvis 0.015, trunk 0.015
